name: Your Sinclair: The Magnificent Seven #1
description:
This compilation contains the following list of games, demos and one program:

SIDE A

  • The Famous Five: Five on a Treasure Island (complete adventure)
  • Ant Attack (complete game)


SIDE B

  • Match of the Day (playable demo)
  • Block Dizzy (reader's game)
  • Samtris (SAM game)
  • Signal Part 3 (PD demo)
  • Pokerama (poking program)

releases.comments: Covermount on Your Sinclair magazine, issue 81 (September 1992)
